file.name: ArraysMan06Review
file.title: Review Manipulating Arrays
file.bullet: What is the Array method to add an element to the front of the array?
.unshift adds an item to the beginning of an array
What is the Array method to add an element to the end of the array?
.push adds an item to the end of an array
What is the Array method to remove an element from the front of the array?
.shift removes an item from the beginning of an array
What is the Array method to remove an element from the end of the array?
.pop removes an item to the end of an array
What is the Array method to find the first occurrence of a value in an array?
.indexOf starts searching from the beginning of an array and will return the first occurrence of the search value.
What is the Array method to find the last occurrence of a value in an array?
.lastIndexOf starts at the end of the array and works backwards.
What is the Array method that allows us to copy a portion of an array?
.slice allows us to copy a portion of an array.
What is the Array method to allows us to reverse the order of an array?
.reverse reverses the order of the array.
What is the Array method to allows us to sort an array?
.sort sorts the order of the array.
What is the Array method splits a delimited string into array elements?
.split breaks up a delimited string into array elements.
What is the Array method joins array elements into a delimited string?
.join joins array elements into a delimited string.
